column2: Arabic: قوريولي‎) is a city in southern Somalia. It is located in the Lower Shebelle (Shabeellaha Hoose) region. It’s population is majority Garre clan

column1: In 2018 a Somali government position in Qoryoley was attacked by Al-Shabab militants
column2: resulting in the deaths of two militants.

column1: Qoryoley has a population of around 62
column2: 700. The broader Qoriyoley District has a total population of 134
